*merges with spiders, becomes Hellish Spiderlord.*
YA DONE FUCKED UP NOW! I'm go go eat LA, maybe enslave San Diego while I'm in the neighborhood. See ya, suckers.

*second heavy launches another rocket, causing the heavy to enter critical mode*

*3 turns before he dies*

*all squads move blue boclks maximum and put into overwatch (any enemy entering their line of sight gets shoot) except support, who moves all the way to the heavy*

*turn ends*

Henshin!

Kamen Rider Alpha!

Everyone! Get out of the way!

*All of the Kamen riders as of now appear out of nowhere*

Kamen rider #1: Let's do this! Rider...

*They all leap into the air*

*I Do the same*

topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
*While our heroes are fighting the monstrous nightmare of reality known as the Angel Spider with a Gas Mask, their battle is being broadcast throughout the world.*

*Meanwhile, a young and yet dashing man stood from the Moon, watching the event unfold itself while avoiding to be involved in mortal affairs.*

*That man would be me, the narrator with an equally dashing voice.*
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
